I've been here in the afternoon and at night.  It's a lot of fun and a great environment.  The outside seating is awesome as the square has a lot of potential, but expect a healthy wait at all times of the day!  Their burgers are fantastic, and we love the Patatas Fritas with Rosemary, but sadly they were out the last time we visited.  It did, and usually does, take awhile to get service... they seem to be perpetually understaffed.  The servers and bartenders are all great and quirky which adds to the ambience.  I definitely recommend it.  Cash only!
